title: MOOC Collaboration Strategies and Barrier Analysis: Case Studies from Europe and the U.S. (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using online learning platforms and comprehension of secondary education curricula
context.additional_context: Conducted in a BYOD environment, providing mobile-optimized content

learning_goals: It can explain the three key success factors of the MOOC collaboration model.
It can analyze the five barriers that arise when institutions collaborate on MOOCs.
It can propose institution-specific strategic support plans by referencing European and American case studies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
